title: Rudy Vanderlans
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Rudy Vanderlans**

Rudy Vanderlans (b. 19--) is a graphic designer who has produced a few successful retail type designs. He co-founded [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre) with his wife [Zuzana Licko](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zuzana%20Licko) in 1984. He acted as the chief editor and art director of the foundry's magazine through it's long lifespan from 1984 until 2001.

Vanderlans designed the typefaces [Oblong](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Oblong), [Suburban](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Suburban), and [Variex](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809044711/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Variex), all of which are available through Emigre's font foundry.

Born in the Netherlands, he lives today in northern California.
author: dan_reynolds
